data.title: Warren Beatty (Actor and Filmmaker)
data.meta_description: Beatty broke onto the scene with 'Splendor in the Grass' (1961). Then at 29, he produced and acted in 'Bonnie and Clyde' (1967)—from there he continued...
data.text:
Full Name: Henry Warren Beatty

Profession: Actor and Filmmaker

Biography: Beatty broke onto the scene with 'Splendor in the Grass' (1961). Then at 29, he produced and acted in 'Bonnie and Clyde' (1967)—from there he continued this successful transition from a young actor to a respected producer.

Those that knew him in his early acting years would hardly have found this surprising, with him admitting his ambition and evincing it in the many suggestions he made even as a young actor.

Since making it, Beatty has acted in and produced a number of prominent films: 'Heaven Can Wait' (1978), 'Dick Tracy' (1990), 'Bulworth' (1998), etc. He has been nominated for 18 Golden Globe Awards, of which he was won six.

Born: March 30, 1937

Birthplace: Richmond, Virginia, USA

Age: 87 years old

Generation: Silent Generation

Chinese Zodiac: Ox

Star Sign: Aries

Articles and Photos

Bonnie and Clyde Killed

FBI photo of the car carrying Bonnie and Clyde after the shootout

Acting Career

"Bonnie and Clyde" crime film directed by Arthur Penn and starring Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway, is released

Arthur Penn's film "Bonnie and Clyde" premieres in Paris, France with stars Warren Beatty & Faye Dunaway in attendance

Warner Bros. releases "McCabe & Mrs. Miller", a western film by Robert Altman, starring Warren Beatty and Julie Christie, with songs by Leonard Cohen

Film "Dick Tracy" with Warren Beatty & Madonna premieres

Personal Life

American actress Annette Bening (33) weds American actor-director Warren Beatty (54)
